scheduled_maintenances.name: [GRA1][Network] - Rooms G108 / G118 Network vRack equipment maintenance notification

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our network infrastructure. Start time : 04/06/2025 23:30 UTC End time : 05/06/2025 02:30 UTC Service impact : During the maintenance, vRack (Private Network) will be unreachable in the rooms G108 and G118. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will have to carry out interventions on a network core equipment. Thank you for your understanding.
